mapper.select: SELECT order_no, order_dt, vend_cd, vend_nm, prog_appe, paprd_dt, order_nm FROM order_sheet_test ORDER BY order_no
SELECT 'ORD' || TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(order_no, 4)),999) + 1) as orderNo FROM order_sheet_test
SELECT edcts_cd, prdt_nm FROM edcts ORDER BY edcts_cd
mapper.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(order_no, 4)),999) + 1) FROM order_sheet_test
INSERT INTO order_sheet_test (order_no, order_dt, vend_cd, vend_nm, prog_appe, paprd_dt, order_nm ) VALUES ('ORD' || #{orderNo}, #{orderDt}, #{vendCd}, #{vendNm}, '접수완료', #{paprdDt}, #{orderNm} )
INSERT INTO order_sheet_prd_test ( edcts_cd, order_cnt, prdt_nm, order_no ) VALUES ( #{edctsCd}, #{orderCnt}, #{prdtNm}, #{orderNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT op.edcts_cd, op.prdt_nm, op.order_cnt, v.vend_nm, v.vend_mag, v.vend_addr FROM order_sheet_test o JOIN order_sheet_prd_test op ON o.order_no = op.order_no JOIN vend v ON o.vend_cd = v.vend_cd WHERE op.order_no = #{orderNo} ORDER BY op.edcts_cd

SELECT order_no, order_dt, vend_cd, vend_nm, prog_appe, paprd_dt, order_nm FROM order_sheet_test
AND order_nm LIKE '%' || #{orderNm} || '%'
AND prog_appe LIKE '%' || #{progAppe} || '%'
AND order_dt >= #{orderDt} and order_dt <= #{paprdDt}
